# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new responder object with data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: An unarchiver object.

## Creating Responders

- **init()**: Creates a new responder object.
title: init(coder:)
